website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to stylish yet affordable lifestyle sneakers, one brand that immediately comes to mind is Steve Madden. Such factors are seen in the extremely inexpensive pair of low-top Steve Madden Fenta.This style is far tamer and modest versus the runway-ready selections from the brand. Plus, the shoe is equipped with basic cushioning properties.
pros: Most of the Steve Madden Fenta buyers are drawn to its sharp and stylish design
The majority of the reviewers have mentioned the upper is made of moderately thick textile
This shoe is among the Steve Madden shoes that offer sufficient cushioning, according to several wearers
Quite a lot of owners have stated that it’s comfy straight from the box
Others have noted that its oxford style makes it suitable for casual work setup, weekend sprees and even for night outs downtown
Not only is this style liked by many when paired with jeans but with chinos and khakis too
cons: Many reviewers say that the Steve Madden Fenta is poorly assembled
Some buyers have shared that it is slippery on smooth surfaces like tile floors

customer_reviews.title: Peeling
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, but the white color on the sole started peeling off after just a couple wears. It’s not a solid white sole. It’s a gum sole with a white coating on the outside band and if it scrapes against something, it’ll start to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, looks good fit well. The only issue is the bottoms are slippery and need to be scuffed up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband and they ar who’s favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fall apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these in two different colors four months ago. This pair is falling apart where the rubber meets the canvas, and the other pair is falling apart at the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible shoe, it lasted two days and the outer sole started pulling away from the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Benson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look like they do in the picture. They fit well and are a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Greg K

customer_reviews.title: Size Runs a little Big.
customer_reviews.text: Size runs a little big. But overvall, fabric looks great in quality!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: You cant wash them because they get stains from water and doesnt go away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are some very nice classy shoes! Just a bit long in the toes, but overall great fit and look!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor P

customer_reviews.title: WHATTHE
customer_reviews.text: WORST SHOE EVER MADE. DON"T WAIST YOUR MONEY. GOOD LUCK TRYING TO RETURN. NO REFUNDS, LONG SHIPPING TIME. SHIPPED IN PLASTIC BAG SHOVED INTO MY MAIL BOX. NO IN SOU SUPPORT. NO STARS FOR THIS SWAN SONG. YOU CAN BUY SHOES LIKE THIS AT WALMART FOR TEN DOLLARS.
customer_reviews.author: Ritmo

customer_reviews.title: That leather flat is just there to annoy you
customer_reviews.text: Just like every other shoe and ok just annoying back flap that perfectly hit my jeans and drove me up a wall by being up or down and just catching every time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: its been just a month and the stitches are coming off. Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Rishikesh More

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look and fit fine, just poor quality: the shoes rip after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jefte Drijvers

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Summary: Not wort it The Good: - They look great: Casual and modern The Bad: - You get shoe bites. They are very stiff at the back and have an unusual lip that rubs against your Achilles tendon on every step - The fabric doesn’t breathe. Your feet sweat in them
customer_reviews.author: Constantin Scholl
